sentences.en: A sharp blade is likely to nick the skin and draw blood.
sentences.cn: 锋利的刀刃可能会划伤皮肤，导致出血。

sentences.en: Davey sat as if hypnotized by the sound of Nick's voice.
sentences.cn: 戴维坐在那里，好像被尼克的声音迷住了似的。

sentences.en: His ribs were damaged, but other than that he's in good nick.
sentences.cn: 他的肋骨受了损伤，但除此之外一切都还好。

sentences.en: Last Thursday, Nick announced record revenues of $3.4 billion.
sentences.cn: 上个星期四，尼克宣布公司收入创下34亿美元的纪录。

sentences.en: News of interest cuts came in the nick of time for borrowers.
sentences.cn: 对借款人来说，减息的消息来得正是时候。

sentences.en: Nick Faldo was beaten by Peter Baker in a play-off.
sentences.cn: 尼克·福尔多在附加赛中被彼得·贝克击败。

sentences.en: Nick glanced around at the haggard faces watching him.
sentences.cn: 尼克环视着盯着自己的那一张张憔悴的面孔。

sentences.en: Nick jabbed his finger at the clothes on the bed.
sentences.cn: 尼克用手指戳了戳床上的衣服。

sentences.en: Nick looked back over his shoulder and then stopped, frowning.
sentences.cn: 尼克回头看了看，又皱着眉头停了下来。

sentences.en: Nick Sullivan previews this season's collections from Paris and Milan.
sentences.cn: 尼克·沙利文对这一季来自巴黎和米兰的时装系列作了预评。

sentences.en: Nick's bank sent him a letter saying he was £100 overdrawn.
sentences.cn: 银行致函尼克，称他透支了100英镑。

sentences.en: Seems we got here just in the nick of time.
sentences.cn: 看来我们来得正是时候。

sentences.en: She sipped the wine. Everything was hazy now, except for Nick's face.
sentences.cn: 她小口地抿着酒。现在一切都变得模糊起来，除了尼克的脸。

sentences.en: The barbed wire had left only the tiniest nick just below my right eye.
sentences.cn: 这带刺的铁丝在我右眼正下方只留下了极小的划痕。

sentences.en: Tom's house is actually in better nick than mine.
sentences.cn: 说实在的，汤姆家房子的状况比我家的强。

sentences.en: When his headaches developed Nick became bad-tempered and even violent.
sentences.cn: 尼克出现头痛时脾气就变得很差，甚至还会动粗。

sentences.en: you've kept the car &B{in good nick}.

words.tran_cn: 刻痕于；挑毛病；用刻痕记

trans.tran_cn: 刻痕，缺口，〈英俚〉监狱，〈美俚〉五分镍币
trans.tran_en: a very small cut made on the edge or surface of something

trans.tran_cn: 刻痕于，割伤，挑毛病，〈英俚〉逮捕
